name: Stacky Spinners
description:
I've been studying unity3d development part-time for a year now, then I realized that I put a lot of time studying but not really developing anything. So here is my first game ever. This game is 100% inspired by Tower Bloxx, an old Nokia mobile game.

In this game, all that you'll be trying to do is stacking the blocks 'Spinners' on top of each other to either achieve the highest stack, highest points (depending on how accurate you stack the Spinners on top of each other), or highest score which is the points over the number of all consumed spinners.

If you want to give this game a chance, please help me improve by leaving any comment.

Thanks.
